Na' beṉ'ka' chṉabia' lo yell-lioni, na' no beṉ' zakii, na' no beṉ' wni'a, na' no x̱an soldadka', na' no beṉ' mbejlawin, no beṉ' ndoo lla yel chone' xshin beṉ' na' no beṉ' chon xshinkze', jakwash'gake' no ḻoo blej, no ladj yajka' lle' lo yaaka'.

San ka nak beṉ'ka' blleb gon nad' txen, na' beṉ'ka' bi wyajḻe' c̱ha', na' beṉ'ka' chongake' daa chakzbanid', na' beṉ' wen xyaka', beṉ'ka' chṉelen ljwellin, beṉ'ka' nḻan yeḻ' willa'na', beṉ'ka' choe'la'o yaj yagka', na' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' wxiye'ka', ḻegaken' chidoḻ'gake' shajgake' lo yi' gabiḻa' daa nc̱hix̱ azúfrena', na' ḻennan' yeḻ' wit wchopina'.
Na' ṉaa, bibi wsej wllonan c̱hoatego' nisa' na' wṉabi X̱ancho Jesúza' yisol yiṉite' saaxya c̱ho'ka'.”
Na' yish' yic̱hjbka' nakan ka yish' yic̱hj noolə, na' ḻeybka' nakan ka ḻey bell.
To beṉ' nḻane' chone' xshin X̱anchona' bi chiyaḻ' wshagdiḻe' beṉ', san chiyaḻ' gonile' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' wen. Na' chonan byen gak wli' wsedile' beṉ', na' chiyaḻ' gape' yeḻ' chxenlall'.
Ḻa'kzi bi zoalen' le', chi' yic̱hjkz' le' na' chiba chizakid' daa ṉezid' nsa' c̱hele wen na' zoac̱hec̱hle chonḻilall'le Crístona'.
Ḻa' X̱ancho Chioza' chap chwie' beṉ'ka' nak beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao', na' chzenague' kat' chṉabgake' yeḻ' goklen c̱he'na', per bi chle'shiile' beṉ'ka' chon mal.

Na' neto' ṉaa, toshiizi chiyaḻ' we'nto' Chioza' yeḻ' chox̱ken ni c̱hele, le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', beṉ' chaki Chioza'. Ḻa' dii nechte Chioza' wleje' le' kwenc̱he yilale bi kwiayi'le daa ba bix̱is biyib Espíritu Sánto c̱he'na' le' na' daa chajḻe'le dill' ḻi c̱he'na'.

Beṉ' mala' shajlenshaze' dii mala' chone', na' beena' nda' nchen saaxyana' shajlenshaze' saaxya c̱he'na'; na' beṉ' wenna' soatezi soe' gone' wen, na' beena' nak lall' na' Chioza' soatezi soe' gonche' daa cheeni Chioza'.
Na'ch Pédrona' chi'e ḻegake': ―To tole, ḻi yiyaj yileni na' ḻi c̱hoa nisa' shi ba chonḻilall'le Jesucrístona', na' yiyakxen xtoḻ'leka' na' yidsoa Espíritu Sántona' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Wsak'gale ni tole bi yizi'zle wzon c̱he beṉ' shi bi gone' c̱hele, san ḻi gon ka dii le gonle dii wenna', aga to ladjle na'zə, san kon yog'ḻoḻte beṉ'.

Na' ka'kzə beṉ' byoka', lwaa dii nan soalengake' noolə, chibalgakile' chiyat'len ljwell beṉ' byogake', na' chonlen ljwellgake' daa nak dii zban. Na' chzak'zi'len beli chen c̱he'ka' yeḻ' zak'zi'na' daa chidoḻ'gake' daa chongake' dii malka'.
Ḻi yiba yizakleni nad', na' ḻi soa mbalaz ka zoa'.
Na' ṉaa, ḻi wzenag c̱he X̱ancho Chioza', na' ḻi yiyaj yileni dii malka' chonle kwenc̱he yizi'xene' c̱hele na' wzoe' le' mbalaz.
Na' puertka' zoa yella' toshiizi iyaljgakan, ḻa' bichbi waḻ gat' na'.
Ḻa' beṉ'ka' gaogake' kwerp c̱ha'ni na' yeejgake' chen c̱ha'ni, beṉ'kan' gat' yeḻ' mban c̱hegake' zejḻi kaṉi. Na' kat' illin lla te c̱he yell-lioni, nad' yisbangakee ladj beṉ' wetka'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Aga bi yeḻ' wṉabia' napo' bi gonilo' nad' sheḻ' bi noṉ Chioza'n li'. Daan, beena' bdie' nad' lawo' ni, doḻ' xench nape' aga ka li'.
Ka'kzan beena' nonḻilallee Chioza', shi bi chone' daa nak wen, bibi zjanayin ne' nonḻilalleene'.

Ley daa bzej dii Moiséza' bi gok yislan cho' lao saaxyana' daa choncho ka na beli chenna'. Daan Chioza' bseḻee X̱iine'na' goke' beṉ' de beli chen ka cho' per bi goke' beṉ' saaxya, na' wdixje' saaxya c̱hechoka' ka wite' kwenc̱he bich iṉabia'n cho'.
Per shi yeḻ' chon wen c̱helena' wtiḻ'le yeḻ' zak'zi'ka', chakomba le'. Na' bi gall illebzle bi goni beṉ' le', na' bi gakshejlall'le.
Na' le' chisgol chischoole, bi wsheshlenle xiiṉleka' konteḻe, kwenc̱he bi gakyesh'gakib'.

Na' besyaadie' ne': ―¡Ba wlliayi' Babilóniana', yella' ḻe wzeyi c̱heyi! ¡Ba wlliayi'n! Ba biyakan lill xḻatjə dii x̱iw'ka'. Ba biyakan ga lle' lla' chiya dii x̱iw' na' ga lle' lla' yog'ḻoḻ ba chda xan yabana' ba nak zban, ba chpani beṉ'.

¿Noran beṉ' wxiye'na'? Ḻen' beena' na c̱he Jesúza' aga ḻen' Crístona', beena' chbezcho wseḻ' Chioza'. Beena' na ka', ḻen' chakzbanile' Crístona', na' chzoe' X̱acho Chioza' ka'lə len Xiiṉe' Jesucrístona'.

Nottezə beṉ' gawe' yetxtila' wa yeeje' vinona' daa chonan ka lljadinicho X̱anchona', na' bi chape' balaaṉ ka nak daa chone', toz ka nak xtoḻeena' ka c̱he beṉ'ka' betgake' X̱anchona' na' blaljgake' xc̱hene'na'.
Bi gono' ka beṉ' bi nteyi. Chiyaḻ' gakbe'ilo' shi bi chono' daa nak wen, bibi zjanayin no' chajḻi'o c̱he Chioza'.
Na' bllinlen Juda' beṉ' zan soldad na' zi x̱oṉj beṉ'ka' chap yoodo'na', beṉ'ka' bseḻ' bx̱ozka' chṉabia' len fariseoka'. Zejgake' nox̱'gake' no kandil, no yi' yech, na' dii wṉiagakile'.
Per ṉezicho X̱anchona' chone' ka ne', na' gone' ka soac̱hec̱hchle na' gap wwie' le' lao dii mala'.
Na' ka bich gok wkwash'gake'b' lille'ka', benan byen jc̱hoongake'b' kwenc̱he nan guetb'. Na'ch noola' nak xiiṉ faraónna' billelile'b' na' bikeeb' na' bisgole'b' ka xiiṉe'.
Na' anjla' bex̱ee barsera', wlo'en yi' gaḻja' daa chi' gana' chey yala', na' bzaḻeen lo yell-lioni. Na' goshj wtin, na' gok sshag, na' wyep yes, na' wxo' wṉib yell-lioni.

Ḻa' yella' wlle' beṉ'ka' zaklebi noola' chsolli beṉ' kwenc̱he gonlen ljwellgake' bittez dii zbanka' cheeni beli chen c̱he'ka', daa wlooyeḻ'gake' beṉ'ka' lle' yog' naciónka' len beṉ'ka' chṉabia' ḻegake' kwenc̱he gongake' dii malka' bengake'. Na' beṉ'ka' chit' chde lo yell-lioni biyakgake' beṉ' wni'a ni c̱he yella' daa chit' chdegake' diika' zeelo chibayi beṉ'ka' lle' na'.
Na' ni c̱heyi diikin, bex̱' beṉ' wlall c̱ha'ka' nad' yoodo'na' na' nan witgake' nad'.
Na' yiḻaala'ogake' daa nak dii ḻi na' wzenaggake' bizə dill' gol.
Per bia'kzə zoa baḻ-le bi chajḻe'le. Goll Jesúza' ḻegake' ka', ḻa' dezd nechte ba ṉezkzile' no beṉ'ka' bi chajḻe' c̱he' na' non gon ḻe' lo na' beṉ' malka'.
Na'ch che' Jesúza'ne': ―Wḻeejch' lat' yetxtili ḻo'i dga yoll ḻoo yeeṉi, na' kon beena' wi'an, ḻen' gon ka'. Na'ch bḻeeje' lat' yetxtila' na' bi'en Jud Scariota', xiiṉ beena' le Simón.
Timoteo, wlooshosh yic̱hjo' dga ba wnia' li'. Bi wzenago' dill'ka' bi yejni'alallii na' bibi zakaan, ni bi wzenago' xtill' beṉ'ka' chonzə ka nap yeḻ' sin'.

Na' beṉ' Israelka' bi wyajḻe', gokxe'gakile' Páblona' len Sílaza', na' btopgake' beṉ' wdallagka' nak beṉ' mal, na' wlekgake' to dii zed yella'. Na'ch wyajgake' lill beena' le Jasón jadiljgake' Páblona' len Sílaza' kwenc̱he gongake' ḻegake' lo na' beṉ' yellka'.

Na' shi chle'icho to bish' ljwellcho chone' dii mala' daa bi nak dii kwiayi'lene', chiyaḻ' iṉabicho Chioza' gaklene'ne', na' Chioza' gone' ka yiyakshao' yic̱hjlall'do'ena'. Kan' goncho shi chone' dii mala' daa bi kwiayi'lene'. De dii mala' daa chon beṉ' daa wlliayi'n ḻe', na' bi nia' iṉabile Chioza' gaklene' beena' chon daa nak ka'.
Na' dii ḻi nia' le', beena' wlebe' nottezə beena' wseḻaa, nad'kzan chlebe'. Na' beena' chlebe' nad', lenkz beena' bseḻ' nadaan chlebe'.
Na' yeḻ' wṉabia' daa goṉ Chioza' cho' gana' zoe', biga te c̱heyin. Daan, chiyaḻ' we'chone' yeḻ' chox̱ken na' we'la'ochone' ka chazlallee na' gall illebchone'.

Na' baḻ beṉ' Israelka' chdagake' to to yell chibejgake' dii xiw'ka' yoo beṉ', na' chakgakile' wc̱hingake' le X̱ancho Jesúza' kwenc̱he yibejgake'n. Na' che'gake'n: ―Kon yeḻ' wak c̱he Jesúza', beena' choe' Páblona' xtilleena', nannto' le', ḻi yichej.
Na' Páblona' wzee bc̱hi'e Sílaza'. Na' beṉ'ka' lle' Antioquíana', beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' Jesúza', wṉabgakile' X̱ancho Chioza' gaklene' ḻegake' gattezə shajgake'.
Wsak'gale kwenc̱he bi gakdadz llinna' ba benle, san yizi'le banez do ka nak daa chidoḻ'le.

Beṉ'ka' c̱hop napgake' yeḻ' wak kwenc̱he bi gak yeja' shlak c̱hix̱je'gake' daa ye' Chioza' ḻegake'. Na' ḻekzka' napgake' yeḻ' wak yiyongake' nisa' chen, na' gongake' yiya dii wsak'zi'n beṉ' yell-lioki kon ka'k'to cheengakile'.
Bikz ga gak gono' ka nak dga chonnto', ḻa' bi nak yic̱hjlall'do'na' ka cheeni Chioza'.
Na' yog' beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' ḻekzka' nakgake' lall' no'. Na' ḻegake' ba wloogake' nad' balaaṉ.
Yog'z beṉ' ba wlaagake' lo nez ḻina', na' yog'zgake' nxiṉj yic̱hjlall'do'eka'. Ni togagake' bi chon dii wen. Ni tlish' beṉ' chon wen bi zoa.
Bibi sele wṉeyi c̱he tozle wa kwenc̱he gon kwinle beṉ' choo beṉ' xen, san ḻi gonan kon yeḻ' gax̱jlall', ḻi goni beṉ' ka beṉ' zak'chi ka le'.
Na' ladj candelerka' gall ble'id' to beṉ' nake' ka cho' beṉec̱h, na' nakwe' to xe' dii toṉ dii ze koll' ṉi'ena'te, na' ngoo ḻi'ena' to bad' de or bllinten ka de cho'alc̱ho'ena'.
Na' bibi daa nashj bia' blag' c̱heyin gat'ch yella', ḻa' nan' kwia Chioza' iṉabia'lene' Jesucrístona', Beena' Zaklebi to Xil'do'. Na' yog' beṉ'ka' lle' na' we'la'ogake'ne'.
Daa ba zoa gao kwiayi' yog'ḻoḻte dii de, chiyaḻ' gakle beṉ' nyeeṉ nyeeniyi na' sele wṉeyi we'ḻwill-le Chioza'.
Na' yell Atáliana' biyoogake' to ḻoo barkw na' billingake' yell Antioquíana' gana' lle' beṉ'ka' bengake' ḻegake' lo na' Chioza' kana' bseḻ'gake' ḻegake' lljengake' llinna' daa ba biyoll jengake'.
Shi wshagna'le, bi nakan mal; na' shi to nool wew' wshagna'b' ḻekzka' aga bi mal nakan. Per dii zan dii zed chen chle'i beṉ'ka' nshagna', na' chaklallaa bi gak c̱hele ka'.
Ḻa' aga beṉ' de beli chenzan chdiḻ-lencho, san chdiḻ-lencho dii x̱iw'ka' bi chle'icho, diika' ze lo llazə na' napgakan yeḻ' wak na' yeḻ' wṉabia', diika' chṉabia' lo yell-lioni gani dechga dii mala'.
Shi nole chyalljile yeḻ' sin'na', ḻi iṉabin Chioza' na' goṉe'n. Ḻa' Chioza' cho'en nottezə beṉ' chṉabe'n, aga no chllonile'n.
Bi wsej wllonle daa cheeni Espíritu Sántona' gone'.
Na' ki nak lill xḻatj Chioza' daa bengake': bengake' ḻo'inna' c̱hoplə, na' latj necha' bsi'gake'n Latj c̱he Chios, na' bzoagake' to candeler na' to mes gana' bkwa'gake' yetxtilka' lao Chioza'.

Na' daan, nia' le' chiyaḻ' si'le lawa'na' or daa ba gokshao' lo yi'na', kwenc̱he gakle dowalj beṉ' wni'a; na' si'le lawa'na' lech' xtila' gakwle kwenc̱he bich si'le zto' tale gaḻ'yid gal'bel'le; na' si'le' rmecha' kaale jalaoleka' kwenc̱he ile'ile.
Chzej' le' dill'ki, ka le' nonḻilall'le Xiiṉ Chioza', kwenc̱he iṉezile ba de yeḻ' mban c̱hele zejḻi kaṉi.
Beena' tobia'loze' cho'e xtillee, balaaṉ c̱he kwinzen' chyilje', san beena' chyilje' sho' beena' bseḻ' ḻe' balaaṉ, ḻen' cho'e dill' ḻi, na' aga bi dill' wxiye' cho'e.

Na' beeni' c̱he dill' wen c̱he Crístona' nakan to dii zakii inlleb. Na' ba nzoa Chioza'n ḻoo lall'do'nto'ni, neto' naknto' beṉ' bibi zakii, kwenc̱he ka we'nto' xtilleena', gakbe'i beṉ' yeḻ' wak xenna' nsa'n nakan c̱he Chios, aga nakan c̱hento'.

Le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', bi chiyaḻ' yizi'le wzon c̱he beṉ' shi bi chone' c̱hele, san ḻi gonan lo na' Chioza' kwenc̱he ḻe' wsak'zi'ene'. Ḻa' Cho'a Xtilleena' nan: “X̱ancho Chioza' ne': Nad' yizia' wzon c̱he beṉ'ka' chon dii mala'. Na' nad' wsak'zi'gakee.”
Na'ch che' Jesúza' ḻegake': ―Sheḻ' nadaan chgwaa kwin' balaaṉ aga bi zakiin, sheḻ'ka'. Per X̱a'na', beena' nale nake' Chios c̱hele, ḻen' chgwee nad' balaaṉ.
Bi yeej gaocho to dii gonan ka yinit dii wenna' ba ben Chioza' c̱hecho. Dii ḻi, yog' diika' cheej chaocho nakgakan wen, san bi nakan wen yeej gaocho to dii chonan ka gakc̱hoplall' beṉ' yoblə.
Na'ch btobgake' kwerp c̱he Jesúza' to lech' toṉ na' blla'gake'n daa chḻa' zix̱, kon ka chon beṉ' Israelka' kat' chkwash'gake' to beṉ' wet.
Na' biyeshile' beṉ'ka' got' lillyana', na' wzoale mbalaz ḻa'kzi bikaa beṉ' bi dii de c̱hele, daa ṉezile de to dii wench c̱hele yabana' daa bi te c̱heyin.
Na' lo dia c̱he dii Davina' golj Jesucrístona', beena' wlej Chioza' kwenc̱he yisle' cho' beṉ' Israel lawi dii mala' kon ka' bc̱hebe' gone'.
Per ka na cho'a xtill' Chioza': Daa konoṉ' ile'i na' konoṉ' yeni, ni konoṉ' sa'lall' shi gakan, ḻennan' wloo Chioza' xṉezin gone' c̱he beṉ'ka' chakgakile'ne'.

Na' shi Espíritu c̱he Chioza', beena' bisbane' Jesúza' ladj beṉ' wetka', zoe' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena', Chioza' ḻekzka' goṉe' to yeḻ' mban kob c̱he kwerp c̱helena' daa guet, daa zoa Espíritu c̱he'na' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'lena'.
Na' Espíritu c̱he'na' ḻekzka' chzajniile' cho' kwenc̱he chṉezicho nakcho xiiṉ Chios.
Bi gakzile wak siye'le Chioza'. Daa gaz kwekle ḻekzannan' yizi' yilaple.

Ḻi gakbe'i ka beṉ' wen beṉ' shao' nak Chioza' na' ḻekzka' nake' beṉ' chsak'zi'. Ḻa' bsak'zi'e beṉ'ka' bi benḻilall'gake'ne', na' ba chone' wen c̱hele. Na' gonche' wen c̱hele shi gonle ka dii le gonḻilall'lene', san shi bich gonḻilall'lene' ḻekzka' wzoe' le' ka'lə.
Na' le' beṉ' bish' na' le' beṉ' zan', ḻi gap yeḻ' chxenlall' ax̱t kat' yiyedch X̱ancho Jesucrístona'. Beṉ' goz gooṉa' none' lez yizi' yilape', na' nape' yeḻ' chxenlall' chbeze' gak yeja'.
Chṉabid' Chioza' yiyesh'lallile' Onesíforona' len xiiṉ xoole'na', ḻa' zan shii bidtipe' lallaa na' bi bido'ile' bidwie' nad' ḻoo lillyani.
Na' ṉaa, xiiṉdawaa, chiyaḻ' gakcho Crístona' toz toshiizi kwenc̱he kat' yiyede' yibaicho na' bi yiyii yido'icho lawe'na'.
Ki nia' le' ṉaa: ḻi gon ka cheeni Espíritu c̱he Chioza', na' bich gonle daa na beli chen c̱helena'.
Dillii nakan dii wx̱enlall'cho, na' yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' chiyaḻ' shajḻi'en: Cristo Jesúza' bide' yell-lioni kwenc̱he yisle' beṉ' saaxyaka', na' nad'yeṉ' goklikz' beṉ' saaxya wal.
Na' ḻekzka' nia' le' beṉ' bish'dawaa na' le' beṉ' zandawaa, ḻi gak wal kon yeḻ' wak choo yeḻ' wak xen c̱he X̱anchona'.
Daan, nottezcho shi chakicho zoac̱hec̱hcho nonḻilall'cho Crístona', chiyaḻ' wsak'cho kwenc̱he bi ibix̱cho goncho dii mala'.
Na' daa bzani kwine' wite', biyone' beṉ'ka' bene' lall' na' Chioza' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' zejḻi kaṉi.
Na'ch beṉ' Israelka' bizgoyogake' yaja' kwenc̱he nan wtakwgake'n Jesúza'.
Per cheenid' shajniile dga: Chioza' chṉabi'e Crístona', na' Crístona' chṉabi'e yog'ḻoḻ beṉ' byo, na' beṉ' byoka' chṉabia'gake' nool c̱he'ka'.
Na' zi baḻgake' btitjgakile' na' bet wdingake' ḻegake', na' bc̱hejgake' ḻegake' gdenna' na' wdix̱jgake' ḻegake' lillyana'.

Ka chak c̱he barkwa' chc̱hinan to dii chbekwan daa tozga, kan' chon daa ba noncho lez Crístona', chaklenan cho' chajḻe'chacho na' bi gak c̱hoplall'cho. Ḻoo lill xḻatj Chioza' wze lechaa daa bkwashaan latja' gana' wzoe' na' bi gok sho'gake', san cho' ba noncho lez sho'cho
Bi gonle txen diika' chon beṉ'ka' nc̱hoḻ nniti yic̱hjlall'do'eka', ḻa' bibi zakii daa chongake', san ḻi gon ka yiyakbe'gakile' bi chongake' wen.

Le' beṉ' bish', bi kwell iṉe c̱he ljwell-le. Beena' chbell chṉe c̱he to beṉ' nakcho txen nonḻilall'cho Chioza' wa chiya chiyilje'ne', c̱he ley c̱he Chioza'n chbell chṉie' na' chiya chiyilje'n. Na' shi ka' chono', lwaa wzenago' daa na leya', ba chzoaz kwino' chc̱hoglo' c̱heyin.
Na' puertka' shlliṉ nakgakan shlliṉ perla, to to puertka' nakan de toz perla. Na' nez daa chde yella' nakan de or dowalj daa chep yes ka vidr.

Per Crístona', beena' nak Xiiṉ Chioza', ḻekzka' bene' yog'ḻoḻ diika' golle'ne', na' ngoo lall' nee beṉ'ka' nak lall' na' Chioza'. Na' chon', nakcho lall' na' Chioza' shi soac̱hec̱hcho gonḻilall'chone' na' yibaicho daa noncho lez lljazoalenchone'.
Ḻi gaki ljwell-le do yic̱hj do lall'le. Ḻi gakzbani dii mala' na' ḻi soa gonle dii wenna'.
Na' ka chiyepgake' gok to bedxo' xen, na' bc̱hiṉjan lat'* yella', na' wit galla mil beṉ'. Na' beṉ'ka' bi wit ḻe bllebgake' na' be'la'ogake' Chioza', beena' llia yabana'.
Na' Chioza' bi byalljile' beṉ' yoblə wzajniile' dii Abrahama' daa bc̱hebe' gone' c̱he', san kwinkze' bzajniile'ne'.
Na'ch che' Pilátona'ne': ―¿Berac̱he ki chilli'o xtillii? ¿Abi ṉezilo' nap' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he wdaa li' ḻee yag cruza' na' naptia' yeḻ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he yisan' li'?
Na' Cho'a Xtill' Chioza' gana' chlabe' nan: Betgake'ne' ka chite' to xil'do'; na' ka to xil'do', ba bi chosyaa kat' chshibe'b, ka'kz ḻe', ni shcho'a dill' bi wṉie'.

Na'ch wṉabgake' soa to beṉ' wṉabia' kwenc̱he iṉabi'e ḻegake'. Na' Chioza' bi'e ḻegake' dii Saúla', beena' wṉabi'e ḻegake' lo c̱hoa yiz. Goke' xiiṉ dii beena' wle Cis, beena' gok xiiṉ dia c̱he dii Benjamínna'.

Ḻa' beṉ' zan inlleb beṉ' widenag zoa, beṉ' bizə chon chna, na' beṉ' chziye', na' zangake' nakgake' beṉ' Israel, beṉ'ka' na yog'ḻoḻte beṉ' byoka' chonḻilall'gake' Crístona' chiyaḻ' sho'gake' seṉ daa le circuncisión.
Na' ḻoo lechaa lle' biya bayix̱', no ba llia tap ṉi'a na'in, na' no ba chx̱obi ḻeeb lo yona' na' no ba zoa x̱ilin.
Ba wlo'a ḻegake' balaaṉ ka daa wloo nad', kwenc̱he gakgake' toz ka nakcho cho' nakcho toz.
Dill' ḻika' ba bli' bsedid' li', bli' bsedi'n beṉ' kon ka nakan. Na' daa ba nako' txen Cristo Jesúza', soac̱hecho' gonḻilalloone' na' gakteilo' beṉ'.
Na' na' zoa x̱op yes' xen de yaj, dii choll nis, diika' chon llin kat' beṉ' Israelka' chixi chiyechgake' kon ka na ley c̱he'ka'. Na' to to yes'ka' chollan ka do shoṉ yid nis.
Ḻi yiyeeṉi kwasḻoḻ na' bich gonle dii mala', ḻa' baḻ-le ni bi nombia'le Chioza'. Nia' le' ka' kwenc̱he yido'latile.
Ḻi gak beṉ' gax̱jlall', ḻi ile'shii beṉ', ḻi gap yeḻ' chxenlall' c̱hele ganga na' ḻi gaki ljwell-le.
Na' zi baḻe', ḻi yislagake' lawi dii mala' kwenc̱he bi lljayaake' lo yi' gabiḻa'. Na' ḻi yiyeshlallii zi baḻ beṉ' chon dii malka', per ḻi gakzbani saaxya c̱he'ka' na' ḻi wsak' ki gonle ka chongake'.
Na' ṉezicho Chioza' chc̱hine' yog' diika' chen chle'icho kwenc̱he gaklengakan cho', cho' ba chakichone', cho' ba wleje' kwenc̱he gakcho lall' nee kon ka goklallee.
Yog'te beṉ' ba ṉezgakile' nakle beṉ' wizoa dill', na' ḻe chiba chizakid' ka chonle. Na' cheenid' gakle beṉ' sin' kwenc̱he gonchle diika' nak wen na' bibi dii mal gonle.

gana' bzoagake' to diido' nongake' ka mes de or gana' bzeygake' yala', na' sto yiiṉ dii nwazjgake' or ka ḻoolə ka koll'lin, na' bsi'gake'n yiiṉ daa yoo daa chonḻi daa bc̱heb Chioza'. Na' ḻo'inna' wyooshao' to xwag de or daa yoo yeḻ' wawa' be' Chioza' ḻegake' daa le maná, na' ḻekzka' ḻoo yiiṉa' wyoo bar c̱he dii Aarónna' daa bigaa, na' yaj taaka' gana' nyoj daa nllia Chioza' bia' gongake'.

Kono gak wshalj wshon iṉe' nake' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' lao Chioza' ni c̱he ba bene' ka na leya'. Ḻa' aga no chon doxen ka nan, san Chioza' ne' nottezə beṉ' gonḻilallee Crístona' nake' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' lawe'na'.
¿Abi chajḻi'o zoalen X̱a'na' nad' na' nad' zoalenee? Diika' nia' le' aga to bia'lozan' chṉia'n, san daa cheeni kwin X̱a'na', beena' zoalene' nad', ḻennan' cho'a dill' na' ḻennan' chon'.
Na' beṉ' zan bdi'a na' wṉegake' zban c̱he Páblona' len Sílaza'. Na'ch josc̱hiska' bc̱hogbia'gake' wdiṉgake' xe'ka' na' bet wdingake' ḻegake'.
Na' to dii kob chllia' bia' gonle ṉaa: Ḻi gaki ljwell-le. Ka chakid' le', kan' chiyaḻ' gaki ljwell-le.
Kwerp c̱hechoni nakan ka to yoo dii te c̱heyin. Na' ṉezicho shi ba wlliayi'n, Chioza' yiyoṉe' sto dii kob dii bi te c̱heyin yabana'. Na' aga nakan dii beni ṉi'a na' beṉ'.
Na'ch wṉe Jesúza' zillj chi'e: ―Nottez beṉ' chonḻilall' nad', aga toz' nadaan chonḻilallee, san len beena' bseḻ' nadaan chonḻilallee.
Ka beni Ananíaza' chi'ene' ka', na' golle'ne': ―X̱an', ze xtill' beena' chsak'zi'e beṉ'ka' nonḻilall' li' Jerusalénna'.

Ḻa' beṉ' zan c̱he to kwinzgake' segake' wṉeyi, na' lillinzi selall'gake' gat' kwe'gakile' mech, na' gakgake' beṉ' llalj na' beṉ' chep cha'lall'. Biz gon iṉagake' c̱he Chioza', na' bi wzoagake' xtill' x̱axṉeeka', ni bi we'gake' yeḻ' chox̱ken beṉ' gaklen ḻegake', na' ni bi yoo yic̱hjgake' gongake' ka cheeni Chioza'.

Daa blalj xc̱hen Crístona' wite' ni c̱hecho, ba biyon Chioza' cho' beṉ' ḻi beṉ' shao' lawe'na'. Na' daa wite' ni c̱hecho, ¿alechlin ki yisle' cho' lao yeḻ' zak'zi'na' kat' illin lla wc̱hoglo Chioza' c̱he yog'ḻoḻ beṉ'?
Daa bzajnii X̱ancho Jesúza' nad', ṉezid' aga bi yeḻ' wao de dii chx̱iṉj chḻenan cho', ḻete shi to beṉ' chakile' de yeḻ' wao dii chx̱iṉj chḻenan yic̱hjlall'do'ena', bi nakan wen gawe'n shi ṉaa.
Shi dga wli' wsedilo' bish' ljwellchoka', na' gako' to wen llin wen c̱he Jesucrístona', na' tolla' ba nono' cho'a xtill' Chioza' ḻoo yic̱hjlall'do'na' len dii wenna' daa bsedo' na' zej chono'n.
